sect1.title: ToolChain Variables
sect1.para: We set this up just for uClibc build, we will remove these after we that build. We will reitroduce them in then Final System build:

userinput.literal: export CC="${CLFS_TARGET}-gcc" export CXX="${CLFS_TARGET}-g++" export AR="${CLFS_TARGET}-ar" export AS="${CLFS_TARGET}-as" export LD="${CLFS_TARGET}-ld" export RANLIB="${CLFS_TARGET}-ranlib" export STRIP="${CLFS_TARGET}-strip"
